titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for Panamanian President Delvalle and for democracy in Panama.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/2/1988--Introduced. Expresses concern over events in Panama and the deterioration of U.S.-Panamanian relations. Affirms support for and recognition of President Delvalle, and reaffirms Congress' commitment to the full implementation of the Panama Canal Treaties. Calls upon the President to invoke economic and political sanctions, pending the reestablishment of the primary authority of the President of Panama and a return to democracy in that country.
